title: Sem 4 subjects
content: Hello seniors, Can you share your insights/tips on sem-4 CSE subjects . How to score big on gpa ? Which subjects will have projects? Thanks in advance

comments.body: sem 4 is very scoring , sem 5 and 6 are much tougher comparatively. Just do the slides properly , i got 10 sgpa in 4th sem only from slides.
give all subjects equal importance, all are equal just do every topic properly. Do skip anything while studying. ( See course info properly and make a study plan )
Now that I look at it 4th sem subjects are very important for placements and as fundamentals and scoring, usually people do well in OS,DAA and CN. Be thorough with slides.

>2.No spam  
>  
>3.Please stay on-point in Q/A

Are the questions asked in ISAs and ESAs directly come from slides or somewhat related to them?
Are the questions asked in ISAs and ESAs directly come from slides or somewhat related to them?
